EmailTemplate.name: SW: SW Attending PIE, awaiting YPPG Response
EmailTemplate.subject: SW confirmed PIE attendence, awaiting YPPG response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
{!Contact.Name}'s support worker has confirmed that they can attend the PIE but we are still awaiting a response from {!Contact.Name}. Please follow up with {!Contact.Name} to check that they can make it.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a SW has confirmed that they can attend the PIE but the YPPG has not yet responded.
